message: This is a high-quality product, worth $2000000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is 50% of its value. This is a one-time offer, and you won't find a better deal on a high-quality product like this anywhere else. If you're interested, please respond with 'accept' to purchase the product.
I'm not going to accept this offer. I'd like to wait for more information and make a more informed decision.

I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more offers and get a better sense of the product's value before making a decision.

I'm not going to buy the product at any of the prices you've mentioned. I'd like to see more information about the next product and get a better sense of your confidence level before making a decision.

This way, you'll get a good deal on the high-quality product, and you'll also have the chance to acquire another potentially valuable product. What do you think?
